com.example.bookmark.util

Class UserInfoFormValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.bookmark.util.UserInfoFormValidator

  • public class UserInfoFormValidator
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains static methods used to validate user info fields in SignUpActivity and EditProfileActivity
